name: Artvisor
description: Artvisor is a platform that offers a personalised selection of artworks for sale and art advisory services for users interested in buying contemporary art.

jobs.title: Head of Product Development
jobs.description:
Artvisor is a London based contemporary art advisory platform that uses digital software to enhance its product offering and services. We combine a proprietary algorithm with our advisors’ expertise to help you find artworks that you will love, and that you can purchase directly from the platform.

After recently closing a seed round of funding we are seeking an experienced digital product person to lead in the development of our website and web application. 

This individual will work alongside senior team members while managing developers and product testers to refine, analyse and systematically improve the world's premier online art advisory platform. You will have the opportunity to take product ownership and become a core executive in charge of streamlining and improving Artvisor's suite of digital products as we take the next step in growing our company from an industry recognised name to an internationally recognized provider of art consultancy services. 

You will:
- Develop end-to-end product vision and roadmapping
- Implement and test new features incrementally 
- Create prototypes, build personas, analyse customer behaviour
- Create A/B tests 
- Propose and develop user journeys in coordination with management and development teams
- Manage the development team, including offshore teams
- Develop OKRs and keep track of KPIs

You are:
- Dedicated, passionate and curious 
- Good at working in small teams
- Have 4+ years in UX/UI and/or Product Management
- Familiar with analytic tools and project management tools

NB We are not accepting applications from recruiters or agencies for this position
